item.title: Pokemon GO Aquatic Paradise - All Research Tasks, Collection Challenge, And Rewards
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Pokemon GO Aquatic Paradise - All Field Research Tasks And Rewards
  • Pokemon GO Wandering Waddles - All Timed Research Tasks And Rewards
  • Pokemon GO Wandering Waddles: Collection Challenge And Rewards

Pokemon GO Aquatic Paradise 2024 event offers Field Research and the Wandering Waddles Timed Research. Both Research quests reward multiple in-game items and Pokemon encounters with Shiny probability. Shiny Ducklett and Shiny Swanna are also debuting during the event.

The Aquatic Paradise event commences on Saturday, July 6, 2024, at 10:00 AM Local Time and runs until Tuesday, July 9, 2024, at 8:00 PM Local Time . In addition to the two Research quests, there is a Collection Challenge with numerous rewards. You also get bonuses that include Pokemon GO Incense-exclusive Pokemon spawning, a boosted chance of encountering featured Pokemon through Incense, and double the XP for catching any Pokemon during the event. That said, this guide details all the Aquatic Paradise 2024 Research Tasks, Collection Challenge, and their rewards.

Pokemon GO Aquatic Paradise - All Field Research Tasks And Rewards

The Pokemon GO Aquatic Paradise Field Research comprises 4 tasks with different possible rewards. The tasks include catching a Ducklett, catching numerous Water-type monsters, and more.

Field Research Task

Possible Rewards

Catch a Ducklett

  • Corphish Encounter (Shiny Available)
  • Finneon Encounter (Shiny Available)
  • Frillish Encounter (Female) (Shiny Available)

Catch 5 Water‑type Pokemon

  • Stardust ×500
  • Great Ball ×5

Explore 1 km

Rare Candy ×1

Explore 3 km

Clamperl Encounter

Pokemon GO Wandering Waddles - All Timed Research Tasks And Rewards

The Wandering Waddles Timed Research will be available for $1.99 (or local equivalent). This Timed Research expires, so you must complete it by Tuesday, July 9, 2024, at 8 PM Local Time . Although you can purchase and gift tickets to Pokemon GO friends at the Great Friends level or higher, remember that the tickets are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and Terms of Service) and cannot be bought with PokeCoins.

2024 Wandering Waddles - Step One

Timed Research Task

Reward

Use an Incense

Ducklett Encounter

Catch 20 Water-type Pokemon

Incense ×2

Catch 40 Water-type Pokemon

Ducklett Encounter

Earn 5000 XP

Rare Candy ×4

Earn 10,000 XP

Ducklett Encounter

Explore 1 km

Lucky Egg ×1

Explore 3 km

Ducklett Encounter

Reward For Completion

  • Lucky Egg ×3
  • Ducklett Encounter
  • Ducklett Candy ×20

Pokemon GO Wandering Waddles: Collection Challenge And Rewards

In addition to the Research quests, you can participate in the Wandering Waddles Collection Challenge and get rewards. The event offers multiple monsters to catch and rewards you with Pokemon GO items and a Ducklett encounter on completion.

Pokemon

How To Get

Wingull

  • Wild Spawn
  • Seasonal Research Quest

Staryu

Wild Spawn

Horsea

Wild Spawn

Shellder

Incense Spawn

Ducklett

Wild Spawn

Frillish (Female)

  • Wild Spawn
  • Incense Spawn
  • Event-exclusive Research Quest

Corphish

  • Wild Spawn
  • Event-exclusive Research Quest

Clamperl

  • Wild Spawn
  • Event-exclusive Research Quest
  • Seasonal Research Quest

Reward For Completion

  • 5000 XP
  • Ducklett Encounter
  • Incense ×1

item.title: Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance Makes its Navigators Worth Their While
item.description:
Highlights

  • Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance focuses on the importance of inventory and navigators for treasure spots and stat-building.
  • New side quests and features highlight the personalities and lore of navigators, making them more engaging.
  • Treasure spots provide valuable resources and incentives for exploration, contributing to the game's depth and variety.

The player's inventory in Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance is as important as one might expect from an RPG, with consumables playing a key role in combat, stat-building, and team composition. Though Cadaver's Hallow does a sufficient job at providing items like elemental gems and dampeners, the crux of Vengeance 's valuables comes from treasure spots unearthed throughout Da'at, done so through the help of a trusty navigator. Upping the ante on the variety of navigators available in the netherworld's different wards, Vengeance gives many of them the spotlight they deserve through new side quests, building upon both lore and personality.

As players progress through Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance , there are plenty of tools at their disposal to strategize and build on their demonic party. Doing so requires effort both in and outside combat, as exploration throughout Da'at relies on the Nahobino scaling tall buildings and winding cliffsides in order to reach treasure spots and essences. Navigators are vital to this process, helping to pinpoint these locations and deliver valuable goods like Grimoires, Gospels, and more. Though some might consider the act of stopping at treasure spots tedious, Vengeance gives plenty of incentives to do so.

Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance Gives its Navigators a Greater Spotlight

New Demon Navigators

Areas like the train line outside of Bethel Egypt in Minato can be excellent for gathering resources through treasure spots, being especially worth returning to for the endgame grind. Minato is only the first ward in Vengeance , however, and as the player explores locations like Shinjuku, there are chances to traverse new lands and recruit new navigators, each with their own merit.

Iconic demons like Alice can be enlisted to navigate alongside the Nahobino, while others like Decarabia have been brought back from Shin Megami Tensei 5 , albeit in a different setting. Some demons like Yatagarasu and Amabie will offer to join the Nahobino after completing requests that play into their personalities, though there are even more involved side quests that tie into a new Vengeance feature.

Magatsuhi Wavelength Quests

Vengeance has moments where the Nahobino can align his Magatsuhi wavelength with a demon navigator, controlling them for a short amount of time while they offer fun dialogue that plays into their lore and personality. The side quest for Alice, for example, has her converse with lost souls who she has trapped to play with, including a clever nod to Alice in Wonderland through a Nekomata, who laments her role as the Cheshire Cat. Amanozako and Mu Shuwuu's quests see them interacting with relics of humanity, like old AC units and vending machines, giving insight into their thoughts on human culture. These quests do a great job of highlighting both dark and funny moments, building on the original's charm.

Building On Navigators' Personalities

As an excellent display of the depth in personality that Vengeance 's demons can have, there is even a navigator quest that has the Nahobino controlling Pixie, who enlists the player's help in uncovering a mystery. Calling herself Ace Detective Pixie, she requires that the Nahobino listen to fairies' testimonies to determine who might have stolen a "silvery fruit," which ends up being a concentration of Glory that can be taken as a reward. The quest acts as a mini-game that has the player speak to groups that only lie, only tell the truth, or a combination of the two, relying on deductive reasoning skills to complete.

For players exploring Vengeance 's Taito ward, an adorable navigator quest with the Nahobeeho, a cosplaying Jack Frost who idolizes the Nahobino's looks and skills, offers some great comedic moments. Though not all of Vengeance 's navigators have their own quests, the sheer variety of them available and the details in their dialogue show the lengths Vengeance has taken to make its navigators feel alive within its world. Alongside other quests and features, like the game's Demon Haunts, unique Magatsuhi skills, and more, Vengeance takes into consideration its varied compendium and the demons that inhabit it. Its navigators are no exception, making them worthwhile beyond their means of finding treasure.

item.title: Minecraft Player Loses Their Hardcore World in Hilariously Weird Way
item.description:
Highlights

  • Minecraft player loses Hardcore world due to unfortunate circumstances.
  • Hardcore mode is the most challenging in Minecraft, with no respawns or second chances.
  • Iron Golem's hitbox causes the player's accidental attack, leading to a one-hit death in Hardcore mode.

A Minecraft player online has lost their Hardcore world in a heartbreaking way, after falling victim to some hilariously unfortunate circumstances. Minecraft 's Hardcore mode isn't for the faint-hearted, as this particular player has discovered.

Minecraft 's Hardcore mode is arguably the biggest challenge the game has to offer. In this mode, players do not respawn, meaning one death and all of their progress is gone. There is no way to re-open their world afterward, so one mistake can lead to players losing a massive amount of time sunk into the game. A little while back, one Minecraft player showed off their 12,000-day Hardcore world, showing how long some gamers have been able to keep these worlds going for. The thought of losing 12,000 in-game days of progress is heartbreaking, which is why Hardcore is considered so punishing.

Redditor Direct_Way_8695 shared the bizarre clip, in which the player loses their Minecraft Hardcore mode world in heartbreaking circumstances. On first viewing, it seems the player dies out of nowhere, despite the game telling them they were killed by an Iron Golem in Minecraft . However, a second viewing reveals the truth - the Iron Golem drops down to the player at the exact moment they left-click to hit a block. While the Iron Golem isn't visible, its hitbox is technically in view of the player, causing them to accidentally attack it. The Golem then kills the player in a single hit, ending the Hardcore mode run in a truly weird way.

Minecraft Iron Golem Weird Hardcore Death

Many in the thread were completely shocked that the Iron Golem could one-shot the player through armor, even in Minecraft 's Hardcore mode. Others took the time to point out that these types of situations are why they choose to avoid Hardcore mode. For many, losing potentially weeks or months of playtime to such a strange situation would prove too frustrating, and understandably so.

Despite recently celebrating its 15th anniversary, Minecraft remains as popular as ever. The core gameplay has a timelessness that lends itself to a long and healthy lifespan, and Mojang's continued support for the game has allowed it to thrive way beyond its initial launch. The recent Minecraft Tricky Trials update was the biggest change in a long time, with new trial chambers changing the way exploration works in the game. While a sequel is unlikely, there's no doubt that the original Minecraft is here to stay for a very long time yet.

item.title: Star Stable Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Star Stable is a game perfect for players of all ages who are horse lovers. The game has many different activities pertaining to horses, as well as customization elements, and much more. Some items are difficult to obtain, but by redeeming Star Stable codes, you will receive many rewards for free.

Updated July 7, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to include all the latest information. Stay ahead of the curve by bookmarking this guide and checking back often for new codes and updates.

Star Stable: All Codes

Below are all active Star Stable codes.

Codes Checked on June 7, 2024.

Active Codes

  • FLASHDANCE - Enter this code to get 5 days of free Star Rider. (NEW)
  • HIPPESTQUICKEST - Enter this code to get 15 Star Coins. (NEW)
  • SSOCON23ALL - Enter this code to get SSO Convention 2023 T-shirt.
  • RAINBOWUNITY - Enter this code to get Rainbow Head Ribbon.
  • BLIZZARD - Enter this code to get Celebrity Ski Trip Bridle and Saddle.
  • TEAMCARROTS - Enter this code to get Purple Carrots for Saddlebag Pet.
  • PONY - Enter this code to get Pony Leg Wraps (Star Riders Only).
  • FORTPINTA - Enter this code to get Fort Pinta Leg Wraps.
  • 1WEEKSR2023 - Enter this code to get 7 days of Star Rider membership.
  • MOORLAND - Enter this code to get Moorland Leg Wraps.
  • GREY - Enter this code to get Grey Pet Rabbit.
  • FREEPLAYER11 - Enter this code to get 11 days of Star Rider membership.
  • RIDEWITHUS - Enter this code to get Sweater.
  • SILVERJACKET - Enter this code to get Silver Jacket Cosmetic.
  • BRONZEJACKET - Enter this code to get Bronze Jacket Cosmetic.
  • THUMBSUP - Enter this code to get T-shirt.
  • READTHEBOOK - Enter this code to get Starshine Plush Saddlebag Pet.
  • HORSESNACK - Enter this code to get Apple and Carrot treat.
  • STARSHINEPLUSH - Enter this code to get Starshine Plush Saddlebag Pet.

  • HAPPYHORSE
  • BROWN
  • AREWETHEREYETI22
  • BACKUPBLANKET

  • ALLIN2022

  • HAPPYNEWYEAR2024

Star Stable: How to Redeem Codes

Usually, you can redeem codes directly in the game, but to do this in Star Stable , you must visit their website. Below are the instructions to help you redeem the codes.

  • Go to starstable.com.
  • Log in to your account and then confirm it. You will receive a confirmation email.
  • After that, click the Account button and select the Redeem a code option.
  • Paste the code from our list into the empty field and click Redeem. You will find the rewards in your in-game mailbox.

Star Stable is available on PC and mobile.

item.title: Roblox: Zo Samurai Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Zo Samurai Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Zo Samurai
  • Zo Samurai Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Zo Samurai
  • About the Zo Samurai Developers

Players who like Japanese culture and want to feel like real samurai will love Roblox : Zo Samurai . After completing a short tutorial and choosing their weapons, fans will embark on an exciting adventure. Here, players can find Roblox : Zo Samurai codes that will come in handy during the playthrough, so be sure to redeem all the codes before they expire.

Updated July 7, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've updated this article to look for new codes, but the developers haven't added any yet. Check back later and maybe you'll get lucky.

All Zo Samurai Codes

Zo Samurai was released some time ago and has already gained a large fan base. The developers are constantly updating it and adding codes through the official page. Below is a list of active and inactive codes for Zo Samurai . Fans of the game should hurry up and redeem the active ones before they expire.

Codes Checked on July 7, 2024.

All Active Zo Samurai Codes (July 2024)

  • No active codes.

All Expired Zo Samurai Codes (July 2024)

  • 600klikes - Enter this code to claim a special reward.
  • 550KLIKES - Enter this code to claim a special reward.
  • 500KLIKES - Enter this code to claim a special reward.
  • 450klikes - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • 400klikes - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • 350KLIKES - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • 300KLIKES - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • CLANSV2 - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • 915719 - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • NEWYEAR2022 - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • MERRYCHRISTMAS - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • 100MVISITS - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • ZoDown - Enter this code to claim free Souls.
  • QUESTS - Enter this code to claim 25 Souls.
  • zeekbday - Enter this code to claim 117 Souls.
  • 80M - Enter this code to claim 80 Souls.
  • boarding - Enter this code to claim 100 Souls.
  • halloween - Enter this code to claim 40 Souls.
  • Zowipzo2 - Enter this code to claim Souls.
  • 42 - Enter this code to claim 42 Souls.
  • ZOZO - Enter this code to claim 20 Souls.
  • TWEETERMAN - Enter this code to claim 100 Souls.
  • CODESRHERE - Enter this code to claim 15 Souls.

How to Redeem Codes in Zo Samurai

Redeeming codes in Zo Samurai is not a difficult task. Even so, the process is a little different from some other Roblox games. Below is a step-by-step guide on how to redeem codes in Zo Samurai .

  • Open Roblox and launch Zo Samurai .
  • Go to the board labeled "Codes" in the lobby.
  • Press "E" on the keypad.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Code."

Zo Samurai Tips and Tricks

Below are some tips and tricks for mastering Zo Samurai :

  • Optimize graphic settings to reduce input delay.
  • Activate shift lock for better visuals and smoother movements.
  • Learn to anticipate opponents' actions.
  • Master quick sword equipping and unequipping for proper combat.
  • Enable hitboxes to enhance accuracy and understand attack range.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Zo Samurai

Players who are in search of new games need not worry anymore. They can refer to the list below to find five of the best Roblox games like Zo Samurai . These exciting titles provide a lot of great moments, so players are in for a fun-filled time:

  • Underground War 2.0
  • Jailbreak
  • The Resistance Tycoon
  • Da Hood
  • Flag Wars

About the Zo Samurai Developers

Zo Samurai was released by the popular Roblox game developers - Voldex. They have many other interesting projects, for example:

  • Encounters
  • Base Battles
  • Dungeon Quest!
  • Cursed Islands
